profile.summary:
I find great people & find them great careers. This all starts with a conversation. Along the way, we'll find it together and uncover their values, personal aspirations, and next career move. And if we don't, well then we keep the conversation going, because I want them to get there as their journey matters to me. 

I am a very data-driven technical recruiter with 2+ years of experience across different verticals in the Software, Internet &Telecom industry. I am passionate about building and growing teams. Working with small scale to Global Fortune500 companies, I have grown my skills in Full-Cycle Recruitment, Leadership Hiring, Social Media Recruiting, Headhunting, Strategic Recruiting, and Candidate Engagement. My joy in recruiting, so far, has been matching top-performing & rising professionals with the right career move in Software Engineering,  Management, Testing, System & Technology, and more. 

When I am not recruiting or pivoting tables, I am improving my skills, watching Netflix, listening to Podcasts, and taking care of my doggo.

Come build the future of Internet with us. Are you interested in shaping the future of search, payments, NBU and Maps? Do you want to define the next generation of how and what Googlers are creating? Join Us, Be You and work on the products used by Billion of Users.
profile.headline: Join Us, Be You @Google! We are hiring.

experience.description:
• Recommending ideas and strategies related to recruitment that will contribute to the long-range growth of the organization, implementing new processes and fine tuning standard processes, while supporting  Google's mission to deliver the highest quality results to our Next Billion Customers.
• Building and maintaining network of potential candidates through pro-active market research.
• Strategizing different ways to build talent pipelines and executing on tactical research, referral generation, events and sourcing campaigns.
• Using data and conversion metrics to optimize the sourcing approach and to help share insights to key business partners and working closely with hiring managers to deeply understand requirements of the role, the function and how it fits into the organization.
• Creating innovative sourcing strategies and engagement to bring the highly qualified talent.
• Developing and executing fully comprehensive hiring plans, analyzing requirements to determine target profile needs and matches.
• Facilitating and leading meetings, key initiatives and projects with client groups, and with the recruiting teams, that's gonna continuously improve and scale our recruiting operations and results.
• Regularly managing pipeline activity and maintaining data integrity, and proactively sharing data-centric  updates with internal stakeholders.
• Participating in special recruiting initiatives, including assessment of best practices in interviewing techniques, leveraging of internal sources of talent and identification of top performers.
experience.title: Technical Recruiter, Horizontals - APAC

experience.description:

• Recommended ideas and strategies related to recruitment of talent that will contribute to the long-range growth of the company, implementing any new processes and fine-tuning current processes for recruiting that fits within Google's mission to deliver the highest quality results to the customer.
• Built and maintained network of potential candidates through pro-active market research and on-going relationship management; conducted in-depth interviews of potential candidates.
• Strategized different ways to build talent pipelines and execute on tactical research, referral generation, events and sourcing campaigns.
• Collaborated with closing partners to understand hiring needs and goals, and to develop, implement, and execute a custom hiring strategy to meet the talent pool’s desires to come join Google Space.
• Demonstrated success hiring for various technical roles such as GenSWE, SWE-ML, SWE-Mobile, SWE-Networking, EM.

profile.summary:
A flexible, functioned and innovative team player having 3+ years of experience into Hardcore recruitment covering Major IT Recruitment of Permanent Staffing and Executive Hiring.

Currently I am working as a Associate Recruitment with SQUAREROOT , Bangalore. Working closely with top notch MNC, Mid-Level, Product Companies and Startups. Having experience in working Permanent position completely.
Hands on experience working on across verticals.
Experience on client management across Startups, Product Development, eCommerce/ mCommerce
Well versed experience in IT hiring both for products & service based companies.
Have placed candidate right from laterals, mid-level and Executive level.
Good in client management in terms of getting exclusive requirements to work on. which is of high billings.
Strong in understating the requirements and deliver quality profiles as per expectation
Strong in candidate management to build large network.

experience.description:
I am a part of Search Firm which primarily work with Start-Up’s and budding e-commerce companies in helping them identify and hire technology professionals to grow their businesses. We play a critical role in the success of organizations because recruiting the right resources is the most important function when it comes to scaling up any business.

At this point in time, We are looking for DevOps/ Python/Django/ golang/ PHP/ROR/ Full Stack/ UI Development/UX/ Android/ iOS professionals across

1) DevOps
2) Software Engineers
3) Sr Software Engineers
4) Lead Software Engineers
5) Principal Engineer
6) Technical Architect
7) Engineering Manager

9) Any other Senior roles

Position are based out in Bangalore, Hyderabad, Gurgaon, Delhi/NCR, Mumbai.

If this excites you, please share your updated profile or LinkedIn profile with the details of current salary drawn and we would love to have a chat with you. Please do let us know if you have any reference in your mind
